pages.text: While a $(item)Witch Cauldron$() can be used to make much more incredible brews, some witches may at times prefer to use more subtle brews.$(br)All brews in this entry can be obtained via other means, though the Witches Cauldron may allow to make them stronger.$(br)Mundane brews fabricated in the Witches Cauldron use slightly different ingredients.

pages.title: Absorption
pages.text: Applies temporary extra-health.

pages.title: Blindness
pages.text: Drastically reduces the target's field of vision, darkening everything around it.

pages.title: Fire Resistance
pages.text: Grants immunity to flame.

pages.title: Glowing
pages.text: Makes the target glow obnoxiously.

pages.title: Haste
pages.text: Increases $(marked)mining speed$().

pages.title: Hunger
pages.text: Applies a $(marked)Hunger$() effect.

pages.title: Instant Health
pages.text: Instantly heals a flat amount of health, using the healing properties of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)$(item)Garlic$().

pages.title: Instant Damage
pages.text: Instantly damages a flat amount of health, harnessing the deadly energies of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/cypress_trees)$(item)Cypress$().

pages.title: Invisibility
pages.text: Makes the target invisible.

pages.title: Jump Boost
pages.text: $(marked)Jump Boost$() is self-explanatory.

pages.title: Levitation
pages.text: Slowly ascends the target into the sky.

pages.title: Mining Fatigue
pages.text: $(marked)Mining Fatigue$() makes the target hit much slower.

pages.title: Nausea
pages.text: Induces sickness by disorienting the target.

pages.title: Night Vision
pages.text: Carrots are good for your eyes.

pages.title: Poison
pages.text: Fills the target's blood with deadly toxin.

pages.title: Regeneration
pages.text: By utilizing the life energies from $(l:bewitchment:introduction/juniper_trees)Juniper$(), $(marked)Regeneration$() quickens the healing process when applied.

pages.title: Resistance
pages.text: Reduces damage.

pages.title: Slow Falling
pages.text: Makes the target fall gently, like a feather.

pages.title: Slowness
pages.text: Reduces the target's movement speed.

pages.title: Speed
pages.text: Increases movement speed, using the energizing qualities of $(item)Sugar Cane$().

pages.title: Strength
pages.text: Using the powers of $(marked)Oak$(), this increases damage output.

pages.title: Water Breathing
pages.text: Allows breathing in water.

pages.title: Weakness
pages.text: Reduces the target's damage.$(br)You may also use a $(item)Brown Mushroom$() for this.

pages.title: Wither
pages.text: Gradually reduces the target's health.
